{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3572356,"name":"Ellen Pham","username":"stick3rlvr","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/9dc877/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-29T18:02:33.487Z","cooked":"

Hi CD! We’ve run into a bit of an issue trying with our Auto Align. We’ve mapped out the function onto our D-pad for the X-box controller so our driver can press it as necessary. During competitions and in test mode, the initial press will have a 2-3 second delay before going to the nearest april tag and then adjusting left/right. Everything from then on will run as intended without any delay, but we’re unsure how to stop it from happening. We’ve added in a warmup command with a scheduler inside our Robot.java subsystem inside robotInit() using a pathfinder function within pathplanner, but that hasn’t seemed to work. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated!
The command we’re using is as follows:
PathfindingCommand.warmupCommand().schedule

There are two warmup commands. This one might be the one to use for your case. Do both if you like.
FollowPathCommand.warmupCommand().schedule();
